attributes.action: ESA Support group policy change regarding holidays abroad.
attributes.additional_details:
If you are placed in the ESA support group you are there because you are deemed unable to work. I would like to see the policy and law changed for this group only, To allow anyone who is in this group to go abroad on holiday for up to 28 days without informing the DWP.
If we go on holiday in the UK we do not have to inform the DWP. I feel this policy/law is unfair and should be changed and have a more common sense approach to it.
